metadata.title: CVE-2023-27786 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue found in TCPprep v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker to cause adenial of service via the macinstring function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 3.4.4-2+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-2+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm3').
